00023  //TODO would it be better to use STL lists instead? it would be less code :)
00024 template<class EDGE> struct EdgeListEntry {
00025     EdgeListEntry<EDGE> *next;
00026     EDGE *edge;
00027 };
00028         
00029 template<class NODE, class EDGE> struct NodeListEntry {
00030     NodeListEntry *next;
00031     NODE *node;                     //node
00032     EdgeListEntry<EDGE> *incoming;  //incoming edges at this node           
00033     EdgeListEntry<EDGE> *outgoing;  //outgoing edges at this node           
00034 };
00035
